title: Beading For Law
description: Were dedicated to educating the youth K-12 on the legal system and advocacy.

title: Community History Internship
description: Work with local archives to preserve oral histories and cultural heritage.

title: Philosophy in Action Program
description: Engage in seminars and projects exploring ethics in contemporary society.

title: Literature & Social Justice Fellowship
description: Research the role of literature in civic engagement and community building.

title: Business & Law Outreach Program
description: Learn about business ethics and law in civic projects.

title: Cultural Studies Abroad Program
description: Travel abroad to learn about diverse cultures and civic practices.

title: Environmental Humanities Internship
description: Investigate the intersection of environmental science and humanities through local projects.

title: Art & Civic Engagement Fellowship
description: Use art to foster community involvement and dialogue on social issues.

title: Public Policy Research Program
description: Assist in research on policy initiatives that impact local communities.
